thread.title: Scotland CAN’T stay in the European Union as the rest of the UK leaves, independent or not, Scottish Secretary set to say
thread.title_full: Scotland CAN’T stay in the European Union as the rest of the UK leaves, independent or not, Scottish Secretary set to say

author: Natasha Clark
title: Scotland CAN’T stay in the European Union as the rest of the UK leaves, independent or not, Scottish Secretary set to say
text:
Opinion NO WAY Scotland CAN’T stay in the European Union as the rest of the UK leaves, independent or not, Scottish Secretary set to say 
David Mundell will tell Members of the Scottish Parliament that Scotland won't be able to remain in the bloc, even if it holds a second referendum on independence by NATASHA CLARK
